projects.title: Krishna Dentals Redesign
projects.summary: Complete redesign with appointment booking system and patient portal integration.
projects.problem: Outdated website with poor mobile experience and no online booking system, losing 60% of potential patients who expected modern digital services.
projects.solution: Modern responsive design with integrated WhatsApp booking, patient portal, and SEO optimization focused on local dental searches.

testimonial.quote: Our website went from embarrassing to impressive. Patient bookings increased by 40% in the first month after launch.
testimonial.author: Dr. Priya Sharma

projects.title: Gupta Electronics E-commerce
projects.summary: E-commerce platform with inventory management and WhatsApp order integration.
projects.problem: Basic catalog website with no e-commerce functionality, forcing customers to call for orders and pricing, resulting in lost sales.
projects.solution: Full e-commerce platform with real-time inventory, secure payments, and WhatsApp order notifications for seamless customer experience.

testimonial.quote: The team understood our business needs perfectly. The new site loads incredibly fast and looks professional.
testimonial.author: Rajesh Gupta

projects.title: Patel Textiles B2B Portal
projects.summary: B2B catalog website with bulk inquiry system and supplier portal.
projects.problem: Manual catalog management and inquiry process was time-consuming, with no digital presence for B2B customers to browse products.
projects.solution: Digital B2B portal with searchable catalog, bulk inquiry forms, and automated quotation system for streamlined business processes.

testimonial.quote: Best investment we made for our business. The maintenance plan keeps everything running smoothly.
testimonial.author: Meera Patel
